phrases: This year's Christmas present is...
For... Christmas?
Yeah!
I will definitely go!
It is...
I am sorry, Takahashi.
I am going...
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
As you can imagine, going to Tokyo Disneyland would be a bit much, but...
A hot spring?
And we can spend the entire day together.
The entire day together?
Huh?
Does that mean...
We will be spending the night.
It is okay if we just fall asleep holding hands.
If that is what you want, I promise not to do anything.
How is it sound?
How is it sound?
Impossible.
You do not have that kind of cash.
If you are worried about money, I will take care of it somehow.
In fact, I already did.
Mom, I would like to get my allowance early.
What are you going to spend it on?
I want to spend Christmas with my girlfriend.
How much do you need?
That is not an amount a high schooler could spend in a day.
I really want to spoil her.
I will not allow it.
You will.
Because I am making you a deal.
I will...
Is that your... atonement?
If so, then I do not want you to take it that far.
Are not we honest today?
Takahashi, I want to make this a Christmas you will love.
I am the one who really wants to do this.
I want this to be a Christmas you will remember, so even when we are apart for a year, you will feel like you can stick with it.
I thought you said you did not believe in memories.
Sorry.
I am not very honest with my feelings, am I?
What did you say?
Well, umm... if you leave the hot spring out...
What?
I do not understand what you are getting at...
Your feelings really hit me.
And I am happy about it.
But...
But?
I am scared of this something special.
I am sorry.
I know we only have a little time left...
Like any other day.
I want to believe that it is not something special, and that it is not an ending.
Ah, Yano.
Yano!
She is so cute...!
I knew I should have forced you to go to that hot spring!
Yano, you do not know when to give up.
You promised we would spend today like we would any other day.
Say that to yourself!
You are different from normal!
You are no fair!
And you look really cute...
Let us go.
Please look at the sky to your left.
In December, the winter constellations illuminate the eastern sky.
There is.
It does exist.
I am sure of it.
Here you go.
Thanks.
Ah, it feels so warm!
Your heart does?
Yeah!
Yano.
I am going to take a picture.
Come on, smile.
The guy should be able to win the toy at times like these, you know?
Like in the last episode of those TV soap operas...
Yeah... but this is not some soap opera or anime, so do not be so sulky.
Okay, I am going to press the button!
What is this?
I have got such a weird face!
What?
It is cute!
This sticker machine loves you, Yano.
It plays favorites and leaves me in the dust.
Do not be so sulky.
And my girlfriend was a cheat.
Back then, when I confessed the scars of my past...
Why do not we go get our picture taken at a photo booth together?
Were you an idiot or something?
Yeah...
I thought I was, too.
You big moron.
That is me.
I am so much of a moron... that I fell in love with a person I hated so much.
Then it might be a good thing that you were a moron.
Ah... geez.
You are pretty cute in that one.
And... in this one, too.
The first... picture sticker we took together.
That brings back memories.
It was so awkward back then...
Yano... did you bring that with you today on purpose?
How is it look on me?
Yano...
Once you are in Tokyo, send me tons of pictures, okay?
Like how you look in your uniform... and lots more.
Sure.
Even if we are apart, we are really just a second away, right?
Yeah.
I will be able to hear your voice, I will be able to see your face, and we can e-mail each other, too.
Yeah.
But I...
My family's finances are a little tight right now.
I am sorry.
But I will call at least once a week.
No...
I will be fine.
Do not push yourself too hard.
Take care of your mother.
I am going to look for a part-time job there.
A part-time job?
Will you be okay with the entrance exams?
I will not let my mother worry about me.
What is it?
What?
Is there something on my face?
I love you.
Let us make a promise.
That we will definitely meet in Tokyo a year from now on.
Until then, I will not...
I swear it.
And...
Do not wait for me.
I am very happy that you feel that way about me...
That is cruel.
I told you I did not need your answer yet.
I-I am sorry.
So you say you will not fall for anyone but him?
Yeah.
You really think so?
Even a year from now?
Even five years from now?
Why do you think you know the future?
Because... I promised.
I pushed Yano away.
I betrayed Yano.
You said you wanted to protect me, Takeuchi-kun.
But this time...
Mom...
I am going to go to college in Tokyo.
Why?
You said you were going to a public school.
I do not want to stay here in the countryside.
Are you going to leave me alone?
It looks like you will go whether you have my permission or not.
It is because there is something I want in Tokyo.
Something I want... more than anything else in the world.
What is with that face?!
Nana, you look awful!
I cried so much last night, and I looked like this when I woke up.
Your face looks really bad.
I will go get a cooling pad!
Where is Lalami?
For now, I am leaving her with my grandmother.
I am going to scout things out first, and if I can bring her to the apartment in Tokyo, I will.
Oh yeah, here is my address.
Kawasaki?
That is not in Tokyo.
My college is in the city.
It is only thirty minutes from Shibuya.
Oh, Mizuguchi.
Where is Takahashi?
Sign: Cooling Pads
S-S-She is in the bathroom right now!
Hold on a sec!
Is she taking a crap?
Yeah!
Seems like a really long one!
Makes you wonder what she ate, huh?
You really will not come back at all?
I do not have that kind of money.
Even over summer and spring break?
Yeah.
This sucks... on a day like this...
I wonder if the swelling will go down...
Was not Yano looking for me?
Do not worry.
I made an excuse.
Thanks, Mizu-chin.
No problem.
Then I really will not see you until you get accepted into college, huh?
Go on.
You are fine now, so go.
You really are resolute with your decision.
I cannot.
Like I thought, I am going to cry.
How much will I regret this?
Am I just going to repeat the same things over and over again?
If you ask me if I want to go, my answer is of course no.
If you ask me if I will be fine once I get there, of course I will not be.
I have always asked my girlfriends to stay by my side.
And I thought I would promised myself not to let them out of my sight ever again.
Ever since that day...
Do not worry.
I will not do anything to her while you are gone.
Why am I so nice?!
Am I a total idiot?!
But you know, playing unfairly just does not feel right.
You have a reason to go.
But if you let your guard down, or really take your eyes off of her...
Remember that.
The real battle starts after you leave.
Wait and see what happens a year from now.
What is with the sigh of relief?
I just could not stand it when you two studied together or went to the library together.
Huh?
I will still do that.
That is fair, do not you think?
Then, what about going to the summer festival with her?
That is fair.
No... it seems like you would probably do something to her...
You are wrong.
I would go as a friend!
No, you see...
Yano!
Let us give them some time alone.
Ah, yeah.
Wherever you go...
However lonely you get...
No matter how hard it is...
Do not forget...
You are definitely not alone!
It all equals out, was it?
Yano, you may not have someone left who you really, really love...
So... please do not think you are all alone.
It did not.
It did not all equal out.
It ended up more equal... on the positive side.
Ever since I met you...
We were all indeed here.
We lived here...
I came to love him...
I loved her...
Receiving so many beginnings...
Learning each other's strengths and weaknesses...
Yes... indeed...
Thank you for everything...
I Am About To kimi ga iikaketa kotoba ga
Yubisaki ni sotto oritekita
Nanimo iwanakute ii yo
Tsumaida yubi wo gyutto atatamete
Kotoba wa kotoba dakara kokoro hanbun mo tsutaenai kara
Setsunakute modokashikute yuuyake futari wo tsutsundeiru
Komiageru mune no omoi kokoro ga itai yo
Moshi kimi ga tabibito ni nattara
Dore gurai kimi wo matteru darou
Kisetsu wa kawaru sono tabi ni
Kioku ga usuragu koto ga attemo
Dareka wo konna fuu ni kokoro ippai de aisenai kara
Mamaritai taisetsu na kimi
Itsu datte futari wa hitori ja nai
Kono mune ga kawaresou de
Furete hoshii yo
Setsunakute modokashikute kaerenai kono mama aruiteitai
Yabaisaki ni kanjiteiru kokoro no kotoba wo
The words you were just about to say
fell softly onto my fingertips.
You do not have to say anything.
I will clasp your hand tightly and warm it up.
Because words are words, I cannot express half of the feelings in my heart.
It is so wrenching and irritating as the sunset engulfs the two of us.
My heart aches from all the feelings welling up inside of me.
If you were to become a traveler,
would I be able to wait for you as I do now?
As the seasons change,
even if our memories are to fade.
I would not be able to love someone with all of my heart like this.
I want to protect the precious you.
The two of us are never alone.
Me heart feels so fragile
and I want you to touch it.
It is so wrenching and irritating that I cannot go home.
I want to keep walking like this.
I feel the words from your heart on my fingertips.
Fair
Yano
Merry Christmas!!
